metadata.title: Abundance Surveys of Alaska Harbor Seals

creators.name: Atmospheric Administration (NOAA), National Marine Fisheries Service (NMFS), Alaska Fisheries Science Center (AFSC)

metadata.description: Each year the NMMLﾒs Polar Ecosystemﾒs Program surveys Alaskan harbor seals over a segment of their range.  The state-wide survey takes 5 years to complete (i.e., approximately 20% of the range can be covered per year).  The immediate objective of this research is to estimate the number of harbor seals so that stock assessments, required under the Marine Mammal Protection Act, can be updated regularly.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: Each year the NMMLﾒs Polar Ecosystemﾒs Program surveys Alaskan harbor seals over a segment of their range.  The state-wide survey takes 5 years to complete (i.e., approximately 20% of the range can be covered per year).  The immediate objective of this research is to estimate the number of harbor seals so that stock assessments, required under the Marine Mammal Protection Act, can be updated regularly.
